name: Simple Slow Cooker Pinto Beans and Ham
author: Cindy
summary: This is my simple version of pinto beans and ham. It's just a basic recipe with no frills. My husband always enjoys this version. Serve with cornbread.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ham base (such as Better than Bouillon®)
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring 8 cups water and pinto beans to a boil in a large pot
Remove pot from heat, cover, and let stand for 1 hour
Transfer pinto beans to a slow cooker
Add ham bone, red onion, minced garlic, and ham base
Pour in remaining 6 cups of water, or enough to cover the beans
Cool on Low until beans are tender, about 8 hours
Remove the ham bone, shred meat, and add back to the beans
Serve hot, seasoned with hot sauce, salt, and pepper
